text:
So in this part of
our class today, you

have been introduced to
the four major classes

of macromolecules-- the lipids,
carbohydrates, nucleic acids,

And we've spent some time
talking about information

in two of those classes, the
nucleic acids and the proteins,

by virtue of their
order and polarity.

To conclude today, we've
talked about the bonds that

build the molecules
of life, and we've

talked about the
types of molecules

and this sets you up with some
really fundamental information

that will allow us
to go on and think

about how these
molecules work together
